statements: DELETE FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE report_id = 1 AND department_id = 101;
DELETE FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND termination_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM hiring_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology' AND trend_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_demerographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM hiring_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Diversity in Hiring';
DELETE FROM diversity_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly Report';
DELETE FROM diversity_metrics WHERE hires_count < 10 AND department = 'Engineering';
